Smart Toothbrush with Sensors: A toothbrush with sensors that can monitor the user's brushing habits and provide personalized feedback on areas that need improvement. The toothbrush can also detect the user's age and adjust the brushing intensity and pressure accordingly.

Toothbrush with Built-in LED Lighting: A toothbrush with built-in LED lighting that illuminates the teeth and gums, making it easier to brush in dark areas of the mouth. The lighting can also be adjusted to different colors to help with plaque removal and teeth whitening.

Toothbrush with Self-Sanitizing Technology: A toothbrush with self-sanitizing technology that kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria on the bristles after each use. This technology can help prevent oral infections and reduce the risk of gum disease.

Toothbrush with Voice Recognition: A toothbrush with voice recognition technology that can identify the user's brushing technique and provide feedback on their form. The toothbrush can also play music or provide other forms of entertainment to make brushing more enjoyable.

Toothbrush with Integrated Technology: A toothbrush with integrated technology that can connect to a smartphone app and track the user's brushing habits over time. The app can provide personalized recommendations for brushing frequency, pressure, and duration, as well as reminders to brush and floss regularly.
